name: Liberosis
description:
Liberosis is a relaxing third-person platforming adventure, set high up in the skies on floating islands covered in vegetation, floating wildlife, ruins of old civilisations, and traces of new ones...

Play as a young childlike creature looking for others of its kind, a place of belonging among the clouds.

Solve platforming challenges by using the game's core mechanic, the Vortex, and different environmental mechanics such as updrafts, bouncing poly-pores, and bouncing mushrooms. 

Explore the amazing environment and find all collectables to learn more about this world and what exists within it.

This game was created by students during a 9-week game project at PlaygroundSquad, and it was originally developed for the PlayStation 4.

Controls

Playing with a controller is recommended

SchemeJumpVortexDashMoveM&KSPACELeft MouseRight MouseWASDPS/XboxX/ALeft TriggerRight TriggerLeft  Analog Stick
